title: Dirk Helbing: Social Sciences and Humanities H-index & Awards - Academic Profile | Research.com
snippet: Dirk Helbing focuses mostly in the field of Simulation, narrowing it down to matters related to Traffic simulation and, in some cases, Cruise control. He interconnects Cognitive psychology and Social force model in the investigation of issues within Crowds.

title: Complexity Science Hub * Dirk Helbing
snippet: Dirk Helbing is Professor of Computational Social Science at the Department of Humanities, Social and Political Sciences and associated at ETH Zurich’s Department of Computer Science.
